name: VV_O_R_M.exe
description:
What happens when you click one of those sketchy download links online?

In VV_O_R_M.exe you take control of a malicious program designed to hack directly into the most secure files of unsuspecting computers. Navigate the motherboard and use the circuitry to your advantage as you climb your way through each level.

This game was created by Jasper Murphy for Intro to Video Game Development at UT Austin with the theme 'Electrifying'.

Original music by Jasper Murphy

Public domain assets from pixabay.com
